EmailTemplate.name: 09_24_2014 Peak 10 Webcast.Email_use
EmailTemplate.subject: Is Your Cloud Under Control? - On-Demand Webcast | Public, Private, & Hybrid Cloud Series
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{Lead.First Name:default=Truth}}: Whether you're a Managed Service Provider (MSP), manage an multi-tenant environment, or simply run an on-premise datacenter, the importance of optimal workload placement and optimal workload sizing - from application to storage - grows ever greater with the increasing complexity of systems in the cloud era.
Watch this on-demand webcast recording <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-public-private-hybrid-cloud-lessons-for-scaling-peak-10/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloudwebcast&utm_content=092414> and hear directly from the minds behind the massive cloud infrastructure at Peak 10™ - their challenges, tips, and tricks, for scaling public, private, and hybrid clouds. Watch Webcast <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-public-private-hybrid-cloud-lessons-for-scaling-peak-10/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloudwebcast&utm_content=092414> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
